flixel.addons.tile.FlxTileAnimation

type
class

Constructor

new(Name : String, Frames : Array<Int>, ?FrameRate : Float, ?Looped : Bool, ?FramesData : Array<Dynamic>)
parameters
Name What this animation should be called (e.g. "run")
Frames An array of numbers indicating what frames to play in what order (e.g. 1, 2, 3)
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the animation should play at (e.g. 40)
Looped Whether or not the animation is looped or just plays once
FramesData An array of dynamic elements that let you add arbritary data to each frame
Constructor

Instance Variables

delay : Float

Seconds between frames (basically the framerate)

frameRate(default,accessor) : Float

Animation frameRate - the speed in frames per second that the animation should play at.

frames : Array<Int>

A list of frames stored as int objects

framesData(default,null) : Array<Dynamic>

An array of dynamic elements that let you add arbritary data to each frame

looped : Bool

Whether or not the animation is looped

name : String

String name of the animation (e.g. "walk")

Instance Methods

destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.
